attributes.action: Give NHS Staff more than a 1% Payrise!
attributes.background: As a Country we owe NHS Staff a huge debt of gratitude for their unflinching dedication throughout the pandemic often putting their own families and loved ones aside to protect us. We owe them much more than this meagre 1% !!!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
